price: Cuando les presentó Mis signos [los negaron y] se burlaron de ellos.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahum biāyātinā idhā hum min'hā yaḍḥakūna
